articles.author: Ian Duncan, Lori Aratani
articles.title: Boeing whistleblower death compounds bad news for the company - The Washington Post
articles.description: A drumbeat of critiques and bad headlines have followed the storied American company for years.
articles.content: The death of a former Boeing employee who had raised concerns about lapses at a South Carolina factory has renewed attention on the aerospace giants long history of facing allegations, from inside th… [+9064 chars]
